column5: The MSc in Environmental Technology provides the highest standard of knowledge and skills development for interdisciplinary environmental specialists. Through the course, students acquire a diverse range of discipline-specific and interdisciplinary problem-solving frameworks for tackling contemporary issues in environmental and social sustainability l. A major emphasis of the course is on the way that environment’s function and on the compatible tools, alternative technologies and policies for sustainable environmental management and decision-making. MSc candidates learn to appreciate that successful projects depend, at least in part, on belonging to a network of experts aiming to advance personal and collective environmental and sustainability goals.
